page.title: 15CLUBS+AMENITIES/MIDDLETON
page.content: Until recently,the youth of the area had a flourishing Scout troop,Cubs and Venture Scouts.Brownies have continued to meet,and the Girl Guide company have re-formed.There is a Youth club,and two well-known local pop-groups.There is no Sunday School,but a MotherÂ£s Union and WomenÂ£s Institute serve the community. There are Keep-Fit classes,Over-Sixties club,Bingo sessions,Badminton classes, Art and Dressmaking,etc.A pre-school playgroup exists in Overton,while in Middleton are GirlÂ£s Brigade and Young Wives.
